Overland Flow - Kinematic Wave D8 Reference: Johnson, D.L., Miller, A.C. (1997): A spatially distributed hydrological model utilizing raster data structures, Computers & Geosciences, Vol.23, No.3, pp.267-272

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints

Options
Simulation Time [h]Floating pointTIME_SPANMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 24.000000
Simulation Time Step [h]Floating pointTIME_STEPMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.100000
Manning's RoughnessFloating pointROUGHNESSMinimum: 0.000000 Default: 0.030000
Max. IterationsIntegerNEWTON_MAXITERMinimum: 1 Default: 100
